pages.text:
[Page Title: Jiang's Asian Kitchen Restaurant, Charleston, SC 29412, Online Order, Take Out]

Welcome

to Jiang's Asian Kitchen Restaurant

Located at 520 Folly Rd, Charleston, SC 29412. Our restaurant offers a wide of authentic Chinese & Japanese dishes such as Kung Pao Chicken, Moo Shu Pork, Pepper Steak, Eel Cucumber Roll, Hibachi Steak.
 Try our food and service today. Come in for a Chinese or Japanese Lunch Special or during evenings for a delicious dinner. You can also online order your favorite Food. If you have any suggestion to our food or service, please go to the customer feedback page and leave us your suggestion or review.

Monday: 10:30 am - 9:00 pm
Tuesday: 10:30 am - 2:00 pm
Wed. - Sun.: 11:00 am - 9:00 pm

 520 Folly Rd, James Island, Charleston, SC 29412
 Tel.: (843) 406-0508   (843) 406-0078
Open Hour Address
